title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area
EB: StyledText should only redraw the necessary portion of the client area when appending N lines in word wrap mode
SR:
1. Open the application using the StyledText component.
2. Enable word wrap mode.
3. Append N lines to the StyledText.
4. Observe if the entire client area is redrawn or if only the necessary portion is redrawn.
